p: The effect of soilless media and fertigation regime on total alkaloid concentrations in the root of S. tortuosum was statistically significant at the value of p ≤ 0.001. The highest concentration of delta 7 mesembrenone in terms of area (52.37%) was recorded in the SV medium under fertigation regime 4 (FR4) while the least value (26.35%) was observed in SC medium under fertigation regime 2 (FR2).
